Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Using the principles of Piercing Thunder, you are well-suited to taking advantage of your superior reach to bring your foes to the ground, be they cavalry or infantry. Make a melee attack. If it hits, it deals weapon damage as normal plus an additional [[2d6]] points of damage, and if the target is riding a mount, they must succeed at a Reflex save (DC 12 + your initiation modifier) or be dismounted, falling prone in a square of your choice adjacent to their mount.
